title: Synthesis and characterization of 2-(anthracene-9-yl)-4,5-diphenyl-1H-imidazole derivatives as environmentally sensitive fluorophores
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23511-23519
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03735A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Eyad A. Younes, Amneh M. AL-Snaid, Kayed A. Abu-Safieh, Fatemeh Salami, Nayyef Aljaar, Yuming Zhao
A series of π-extended 2-(anthracene-9-yl)-4,5-diphenyl-1H-imidazole (ADPI) derivatives were synthesized. These compounds show sensitive fluorescence responses to solvent polarity, acidity, and fluoride anion.
